page.title: 18BOXTED CROSS INN
page.content: MR and MRS Smart are the licencees of the Cross Inn. They have been licencees for seven years. The Inn has a very interesting history. It used to be a coaching Inn.Horses were kept there and passengers stayed there over night.They enjoy their work as they like meeting people.They serve meals, bar snacks and morning coffee. Most of their customers are local, but they also cater for coach parties. A story tells of a man who died in his bed, and Mrs Smart says that she hears him calling. The Inn stands at the crossroads, opposite Cage Lane. Drunken people were locked in the cage over night until they were sober.
